description: Well today Sergey came for an interview to be in a gay movie. He has never been with a guy before and decided for his first time to be on camera! Well Damien wasted no time in getting things started first asking him some very simple questions then asking to see his cock! From there all the major action takes place! Damien was pretty pleased with Sergeys performance and I think theyll be calling him again pretty soon. Enjoy!
title: The Big Hard On
